nodes.text: The Grinning Moon of Jiruus was a moon that orbited the planet Jiruus, located in the Jiruus system. When the pilots of the New Republic's Hound and Riot Squadrons celebrated on Jiruus some time after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, the Grinning Moon of Jiruus was visible in the planet's sky.
The Grinning Moon of Jiruus first appeared in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
